short_summary: Programmer/Analyst services for support of MariTime, an application developed in-house.
description: The Canadian Coast Guard requires the services of an intermediate (Level 2) Programmer Analyst and a senior (Level 3) Programmer Analyst in order to support the CCG’s HR system for seagoing personnel, MariTime, an application developed in-house. This includes in-service support, reporting, application level programming updates, and advice and guidance on the redevelopment of certain modules of the application in newer technologies.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=============================

**Programmer/Analyst Services for Support of MariTime**
---------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number**
------------------
PW-22-01016555

**Publication Date**
------------------
December 12, 2022

**Tender Closing Date**
---------------------
December 28, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Overview**
-------------------

The Government of Canada, through Fisheries and Oceans Canada, is seeking the services of a Programmer/Analyst to provide support for the MariTime HR system for seagoing personnel. This involves in-service support, reporting, application level programming updates, and advice and guidance on the redevelopment of certain modules in newer technologies.

**Required Skills and Experience**
---------------------------------

* Thorough understanding of software engineering processes
* Current knowledge of departmental mandated requirements
* Extensive experience in dealing with clients and business requirements
* System and data modifications
* Database reporting in various formats
* Knowledge and code transfer to full-time employees of the CCG IT team

**Contract Duration**
-------------------

The contract is expected to start on April 1, 2023, and end on September 30, 2025, with an option to extend for up to two (2) one-year periods.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Participation Requirements**
-----------------------------

This requirement is open only to suppliers who are hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under EN578-170432 and have qualified for the A.7 Programmer/Analyst category.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For further information, please contact:

Richard Soulliere
DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
Fisheries and Oceans Canada
200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6
613-990-3389

**Note**
----

This tender is closed and no longer accepting submissions. Suppliers who meet the participation requirements can contact PSPC's SA Authority for the TBIPS SA to update their supplier profile
